author: wrowe
msg: Protect envvar values of INSTDIR, APACHE2_HOME, and report APACHE2_HOME
for the user inspecting the build-time variables.

author: wtogami
msg: RCVD_IN_HOSTKARMA_YL is masscheck only, do not ever publish.

author: chammers
msg: LOG4PHP-47      Check if PDO Appender needs quote()
LOG4PHP-79      AppenderPDO: Some database fields seem a bit too short
Improved version of the PDO appender. Apart from increased field
sizes in the CREATE statement, this one features a new configuration
style that enables us to use prepared statements and therefore
The old style is documented as deprecated but still working to
make updates from earlier log4php versions easier.

author: bago
msg: Java 1.4 compatibility: downgraded to mime4j 0.5, some method "backport" and some javadoc fixes.

author: tellison
msg: Remove unhelpful finalizer.  Fields will be discarded anyway so no need to set to null.
